parameter.name: modelType
parameter.title: Model Type
parameter.description: <dl> <dd><u>Choose from the three existing models</u>,OU(Ornstein-Uhlenbeck), BM(Brownian Motion), and EB(Early Burst) </dd> </dl>

parameter.name: selectedDataName
parameter.title: Data Column Name
parameter.description:
Choose a data column to be used for the modeling fitting.
Choose from the table data attached with the tree.
